00024    class FileName {
00025     public:
00026       FileName(std::string fileName):mFileName(fileName) { }

00029 
00030       const FileName& operator=(const std::string fileName) { mFileName = fileName; return *this; }
00031 
00032       std::string GetFullPath() { return mFileName; }

00035       std::string mFileName;
00036    };
